home.coverText:
Welcome to the
future of no nonsense
transactions!

parallax.first: Myriad is an open source, truly decentralized, digital currency that can be sent peer-to-peer over the internet.
parallax.second: There are no intermediaries, no chargebacks and most importantly you control your money.

nonsense.title: In today’s world, there are a lot of coins and a lot of claims. It can be hard to spot what’s real and what’s nonsense.
nonsense.caption: Here are some things to look out for:

pre_mining.title: Pre-mining
pre_mining.body: <0>Premining is the mining or creation of a number of cryptocurrency coins before the cryptocurrency is launched to the public.</0><0>During the ICO bubble from 2017 to 2018, premining was often a red flag that an ICO was being launched to fleece investors rather than</0>

asic_farms.title: ASIC-farms
asic_farms.body: <0>ASIC miners can in some ways remove decentralization from a cryptocurrency. Large mining farms could pontentially give someone the capability to control the future development of the network.</0>

ico.title: ICO
ico.body: <0>Premining is the mining or creation of a number of cryptocurrency coins before the cryptocurrency is launched to the public.</0><0>During the ICO bubble from 2017 to 2018, premining was often a red flag that an ICO was being launched to fleece investors rather than</0>

secure_storing.title: No secure storing
secure_storing.body: <0>One of the biggest problems with many cryptocurrencies is that they dont offer secure storing. Myriad have cold wallet for both iOS and Android.</0>

no_development.title: No development happening
no_development.body: <0>Premining is the mining or creation of a number of cryptocurrency coins before the cryptocurrency is launched to the public.</0><0>During the ICO bubble from 2017 to 2018, premining was often a red flag that an ICO was being launched to fleece investors rather than</0>

pump_and_dump.title: Pump and dump-moves
pump_and_dump.body: <0>When a few people own large stakes in a cryptocurrency it is common that there is a lot of pump-and-dump moves going on.</0>

non_vibrant_communities.title: Non-vibrant communities
non_vibrant_communities.body: <0>The Myriadcoin community is spread all over the world and has a thriving community on Reddit and Telegram.</0>

myriadIs.title: But Myriad on the other hand is:

trusted.title:
Trusted, secure and
up-to-date
trusted.body: Myriadcoins unique multi-algorithm approach means that it has extra resistance to 51% attacks.

community.title:
Community-driven with
democratic decision making
community.body: No one and everyone controls Myriad. It’s a community driven project full of volunteers.

fair.title: Fair distribution and mining
fair.body: Myriadcoin has no pre-mine or IPO and was fairly launched. Myriadcoin uses a long mining period, which prevents a large portion of the coins to be consolidated in the hands of very few.

attacks.title: 51% Attack Resistance
attacks.body: Thanks to our multi algorithm approach.

multi-algo.title: Multi-algorithm
multi-algo.body: SHA256d, Scrypt, Myr-Groestl, Argon2d and Yescrypt.

longblocks.title: Longblocks
longblocks.body: Increased security, less orphans, higher difficulty.

esperanto.title: Saluton!
esperanto.body: Myriad is used to support content creators in the Esperanto community

telegram.title: Got any questions or just wanna chat?

map.title: Seed Nodes
map.description: Myriad has seed nodes all over the world. Join the network by running a full node and making it accessible to the internet.

blocks_mined.title: Blocks Mined
blocks_mined.description: The number of blocks mined on each of Myriad's algorithms.

mining_difficulty.title: Mining Difficulty

hash_rate.description: The estimated number of hashes per second the Myriad network is performing.

transactions.description: The number of transactions made on the Myriad network (excluding coinbase transacions).

mined_coins.description: The number of mined coins during the interval.

inflation.title: Yearly Inflation
inflation.description: The yearly inflation rate for the coins mined during the interval.

top.title: Trusted, secure and up-to-date
top.body: <0>Myriad addresses the issues with ASIC specialization and centralization, 51% attacks, unfair distribution and slow transactions by an innovative approach with a multi-algorithm blockchain.</0><0>It is the first multi-algorithm coin and its innovation has influenced many coins to come. Myriad has a proven track record and has since its release in 2014 stood the test of time and have adapted when needed.</0><0>All development can be followed and discussed on Reddit.</0>

items.text: Myriad was launched by 8bitcoder, forked from Zetacoin. It was the first cryptocurrency to use five proof-of-work algorithms in an effort to increase security as well as broaden the base of people who could mine it - SHA256d and Scrypt for ASIC miners, Skein and Myr-Groestl for GPU miners, and Qubit for GPU and CPU miners.
Myriad hard-forked to allow merge-mining on its SHA256d and Scrypt algorithms in an effort to improve security and achieve a more stable hashrate on those two algorithms.
Myriad 0.11.3.1 is released changing the ticker from MYR to XMY and signaling replacement of Qubit to Yescrypt using mining consensus.

Mining consensus is reached and Myriad succeeds to replace the Qubit algorithm with the Yescrypt algorithm to preserve mining decentralization. Myriad became the first cryptocurrency to use mining consensus to change a mining algorithm.

Longblock is implemented via MIP 3. A gradual increase in block time from 1 to 8 minutes using multiple intervals of block time adjustments. Coin supply and emission rate vs clock time is made sure not to be affected. It is later activated using consensus bit 5.
Algoswap2 is implemented via MIP 4. Swapping Skein to Argon2d. The change is later activated using mining consensus (consensus bit 6).
Myriad 0.18.1.0 is released with improved multi-wallet support and RISC-V support. 0.00000001 XMY is now defined as octibit or obi.

items.title: Fair
items.value: Myriad is fairly distributed. No Premine and No ICO.

items.title: Multi-Algo
items.value: Scrypt, SHA256D, Yescrypt, Argon2d and Myriad-Groestl

community.title: Community-driven with democratic decision making
community.body: <0>No one and everyone controls Myriad. It’s a community driven project full of volunteers. For large changes in Core mining consensus is used. This principle works because of Myriads decentralized mining.</0><0>Myriad strives to be a coin for everyone, not a elite/selected few. Myriad is for the people it can help most. With a truly secure and decentralized coin, we pour our focus and effort into real use cases to help the people with the greatest need.</0><0>For large changes in Core mining consensus is used. The latest mining consensus were 2016 with Yescrypt and 2019 with Argon2D.</0>

fair.title: Fair distribution and mining

mine.title: How to Mine Myriad

wallet.title: 2. Choose a wallet
wallet.body: Do not store your cryptocurrency on an exchange. You should have awallet ready and setup to store your coins. These wallets support Myriad...

pool.title: 3. Join a mining pool
pool.body: A mining pool is the pooling of resources by miners, who share their processing power over a network.

mine.ready: Now you’re ready to start mining!

buy.title: Buy Myriad
buy.body: To get your hands on your first Myriad you need to use an exchange. You can buy Myriad with fiat money or exchange another cryptocurrency for Myriad.

SHA256d.label: SHA256d
SHA256d.description: You may use any SHA256d compatible ASIC

scrypt.label: Scrypt
scrypt.description: You may use any Scrypt compatible ASIC

myr-groestl.label: Myr-Groestl
myr-groestl.description: If you mine using Myr-Groestl, you have a few options

argon2d.label: Argon 2D
argon2d.description: Argon2 is a key derivation function that was selected as the winner of the Password Hashing Competition in July 2015. Argon2d maximizes resistance to GPU cracking attacks. It accesses the memory array in a password dependent order, which reduces the possibility of time memory trade-off aka (TMTO) attacks, but introduces possible side-channel attacks.

yescrypt.label: Yescrypt
yescrypt.description: Yescrypt is a password-based key derivation function. It applies slow cryptographic operations to a password and salt, creating a key suitable for performing encryption or storage to validate the password in the future. Yescrypt algoritm is based on scrypt by Colin Percival of Tarsnap.
